atk_abil: Normal Attack: Stun enemy and launch a fireball that attacks up to 3 enemies.
Skill Attack: Create multiple flame tornados to paralyze and damage enemies.
Special Ability 1 : When first appearing, it uses the buff that increases its movement speed and attack speed, and increases the basic game speed by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Increases human unit movement speed by 3% and attack range by 4%.
Special Ability 3: Not affected by terrain attacks above Stage 10,000.
Special Ability 4: Appears quickly and cannot be interfered by attacks.
Fire Resistance: Increases Fire Resistance by 50. (Also applied in Time Shop and can be applied repeatedly. However, Fire Resistance by [Flame Spirit] cannot exceed 2,000.)
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Stun enemy and launch a fireball that attacks up to 4 enemies.
Skill Attack: Create multiple flame tornados to paralyze and damage enemies.
Special Ability 1 : When first appearing, it uses the buff that increases its movement speed and attack speed, and increases the basic game speed by 8%.
Special Ability 2: Increases human unit movement speed by 6% and attack range by 7%.
Special Ability 3: Not affected by terrain attacks above Stage 10,000.
Special Ability 4: Appears quickly and cannot be interfered by attacks.
Fire Resistance: Increases Fire Resistance by 100. (Also applied in Time Shop and can be applied repeatedly. However, Fire Resistance by [Flame Spirit] cannot exceed 2,000.)

buffs.description: Increases fire resistance even if Flame Spirit is in the Time Shop (5-star 50, 6-star 100, Max 2000).
buffs.name: Fire Resistance
